oai_dc:dc.dc:title: It's Good Business to Locate your Plant in Nashville, 1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A twenty-two page pamphlet put out by the Nashville Chamber of Commerce for the purpose of enticing business owners to locate their businesses in Nashville. Content includes statistics on population, economy, business, transportation, taxes, cost of living, and personal income. Also included are promotional materials, census information, photographs, charts, and graphs. Forms part of the Nashville Area Chamber of Commerce Publications and Reports collection. 1 pamphlet : col. ; 8.5 x 11 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Chamber of Commerce; Nashville Area Chamber of Commerce
